Package com.xhive.xpath.interfaces

This package holds XPath specific interfaces, a number of which are now deprecated.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XhiveXPathContextIf Context that can be used by both XPath and XPointer queries.
 

Package com.xhive.xpath.interfaces Description

This package holds XPath specific interfaces, a number of which are now deprecated.

Users are advised to only use the XhiveXPathContextIf interface, and to avoid the use of the other interfaces in this package. The XhiveXpathContexIf interface can be used to add variable, function and namespacebindings to the execution context of XPath or XPointer queries, offering similair functionality as of the deprecated interface.

Users should also be aware of the fact that a large number of XPAth queries are also valid XQuery queries and that XQuery queries generaly execute faster than XPath queries. You can use the executeXQuery methods on XhiveLibraryChildIf to execute XQuery queries.
